extendedInfo.description: Stylish Girl is your ultimate style planner and shopping app -revolving around the clothes in your closet and the clothes you loveto have.** Stylish Girl for iOS was presented by Apple on the New York FashionWeek and was showcased throughout the world in Appleâs There is an Appfor That TV commercial.Also Featured in:InStyleSeventeenNY DailyNBCFox NewsThe TimesFinancial TimesSan Francisco ChronicleTelegraph UKIndependentThe Huffington PostAnd many Fashion blogsDownload now and see why more than a Million Users downloaded StylishGirl. Stylish Girl is free and we do not collect any of your personalinformation.Fashion is all about how you put your clothes together, so mix andmatch your clothes with the Stylish Girl's FUN & EASY interface andstep up your style.- CATALOG your Closet and Wish Items.  All your wardrobe virtualized!- CREATE AMAZING OUTFITS anytime and anywhere;- SHARE YOUR OUTFITS AND CLOTHES with your friends via email, Facebookor Twitter, and pick the best looks;- SHOP FOR STYLE ONLINE. Browse Shopstyle.com, mix and match the online items against your clothes and outfits;- GET INSPIRED with the latest fashion looks, celebritiesâ fashionstyles and news from selected fashion blogs and magazines.- PACK FOR YOUR TRAVEL QUICKLY without forgetting anything behind;

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I just found this app and i love it so far.. its so cool to have all your clothes right on your phone so when you go shopping you know what you have and if you buy something you know if you have the top/bottom to match it :) love it!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpfull and fun
reviews.comment: Really enjoying setting up my own styles and descovering few new outfits in my own closet by mixing and matching.
reviews.author: Angelika aka Duo Stikla

reviews.title: Stylish girl
reviews.comment: Im so into fashion so this is it the best app for me! Love it no problems and super helpful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic Love It!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app being able to glance through my wardrobe is fab and great style ideas too
reviews.author: Charlotte Hodgson

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I have been looking for a way to inventory my closet. Now I can with ease. This app also helps me to see what\'s in style, so that I can look for similar items closer to my budget. Thanks!
reviews.author: Stevie Linton

reviews.title: Best fashion app
reviews.comment: It\'s very helpful and user friendly. Mostly it helps me look good everyday.  Love it.
reviews.author: Gugu Mkhize

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: This app allows me to create outfits for everyday, which is great for going back to school! I also love it when I\'m shopping because I van see what I have and don\'t have. It is absolutely worth having to take a picture of everything in my closet! :)
reviews.author: Alexa Brown

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This keeps me organized and I know what I already wore before so I don\'t have to worry about what I should and did i wear that..... Great site for all.
reviews.author: Eliana Spaziani

reviews.title: I <3 stylish girl!
reviews.comment: Cool app and vary helpful. I love this app so far!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: BEST APP EVERRRR!!! I uploaded my wardrobe, coordinated diff out fits && even use it to pack 4 trips! SO IN LOVE W/ THIS APP!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Ayron Jackson

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I totally love this app! Its so great becauase I\'m a teen and I always want more and more clothes but with this I can make lots of new outfits and after using this I only bought a few more iteams to complete my look so totally 5 stars! xxooxx \342\231\245
reviews.author: Willow Ryan

reviews.title: Crashes too much
reviews.comment: I hardly used the application it crashed too often for me to create a database. Could not even take pictures of my clothes so I am uninstalling this app. It is a nice idea but they need to fix the bugs. I give this 3 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth it 0 stars if I could
reviews.comment: When I first got the app. It was fun. But after the last up date it will not load, or it freezes, or it says there is a problem connecting. I unistalled it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good but...
reviews.comment: it would be nice to be able to crop and rotate picture,  change pictured while editing an entry,  and add my own categories.  It would also be nice to be able to add a full body picture to each outfit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love fashion and sometimes remembering all the clothes in your closet is hard. This is a great app for those who are into matching their own clothes into a great outfit. :)
reviews.author: Ife Ogunfunmi

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this app and recommend it to all. It is amazing for all those fashion loving peope.
reviews.author: bekah woodliffe

reviews.title: Please oblige!
reviews.comment: Ok, I love the app... but a suggestion- I\'d love if makeup had its own catagory instead of being combined into accessories, and if under garments could have their own catagory, too. If it were done on a up-down scrolling screen.or side to side, the next \" setting\" could be a chest of drawers for swimwear and undergarments, a vanity table for makeups and perfumes, etc. And then makeup could have the sub categories like mascara, eye shadow, etc. Just some suggestions, they\'d make me (and others!!!) Thrilled!!
reviews.author: Areku Kazeres

reviews.title: Im in love!
reviews.comment: This app is amazing! I love that I can shop online, make wish lists, and organize my closet all in one app! Makes it super easy create outfits with items I already have and possibly want to buy! <3
reviews.author: Becca Makhoul

reviews.title: I just love it. It\'s great!!
reviews.comment: Everything they have is beyond beautiful and also affordable I can\'t believe the stuff they have on this site
reviews.author: Sandy Melendrez

reviews.title: Awesome app!!!!
reviews.comment: Love this app. Its really good for shopping and getting dressed. Has many features like a outfit calender, outfit maker, a online mall and more. Only crashed once or twice because other running apps though. Prices in mall are also off if you put in a limit. Also outfit logs keep disappearing and reappearing on the calender.
reviews.author: Mikaela Carroll
